sentences.en: " Ay, indeed! " cried good old Mr. Wilson. " What little bird of scarlet plumage may this be? "
sentences.cn: " 叹, 真的! " 好心肠的威尔逊老先生叫道. " 长着这么鲜红羽毛的会是什么小鸟 呢 ?

sentences.en: " What little bird of scarlet plumage may this be?
sentences.cn: “ 长着这么鲜红羽毛的会是什么小鸟 呢 ?

sentences.en: A Peacock teased a Crane about the dullness of her plumage.
sentences.cn: 孔雀嘲笑鹤鸟,说她的羽毛黯淡无光.

sentences.en: Have you seen the brightly - coloured plumage of tropical birds?
sentences.cn: 你见过热带鸟类色彩斑斓的羽毛 吗 ?

sentences.en: He likes the bird with exotic plumage.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢那只有奇特羽毛的鸟.

sentences.en: Its body plumage suddenly began to ruffle and swell.
sentences.cn: 它全身的羽毛突然竖了起来，胀得鼓鼓的。

sentences.en: North American blackbird whose bluish - black plumage is rusty - edged in the fall.
sentences.cn: 北美洲乌鸫,其蓝黑色的羽毛在秋天呈现铁锈红色的边.

sentences.en: The birds were in immature plumage.
The bright plumage of a parrot made it beloved by people.
sentences.cn: 鹦鹉的一身华丽羽毛使人们很爱它.

sentences.en: The bright plumage of many male birds has evolved to attract females.
sentences.cn: 很多雄鸟进化出鲜艳的羽毛是为了吸引雌鸟。

sentences.en: The costs of melanin - based plumage and iridescence are clearly different from this.
sentences.cn: 黑色素翅膀和彩虹色翅膀的代价与上面却完全不同.
那只鹦鹉亮丽的蓝色羽毛

sentences.en: The Swallow and Crow had a contention about their plumage.
sentences.cn: 燕子跟乌鸦争论有关羽毛的美丽.

sentences.en: This is the only species of flamingo in the region, easily recognized by its pink plumage.
sentences.cn: 这是那个地区唯一一种火烈鸟, 很容易凭粉红色的羽毛辨认出来.

words.tran_cn: 有羽毛的；羽毛状的；用羽毛装饰的
有羽毛的；用羽毛装饰的；羽毛似的
用羽毛装饰；华丽地打扮（plume的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 鸟类羽毛，漂亮衣服，羽衣
trans.tran_en: A bird's plumage is all the feathers on its body
